About Me:

91a3b0 is an attempt to instill a daily writing practice. My intent is to share my media diet, write better, and sharpen my thinking from first principles. Right now, I’m interested in learning how to learn, learning, career growth, and economics more generally. I don’t agree with everything I post, links or posts, and it’s all in the spirit of “don’t devalue and dismiss”. The running ethos behind this is that the individual things I talk about are pretty negligible in the long run. What’s important is increasing the rate of personal growth by using compound time.
